title: Mini-Ep 108: Pluck It
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 108: Pluck It

description:
In this mini-episode, Kate and Doree hear from a self-proclaimed “Glossier expert” and a listener who puts serums on her butt, get some feedback on how to form friendships as an adult, and discuss embracing nipple hairs.


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • WONDERCIDE - Try Wondercide Flea & Tick Spray today at wondercide.com/forever35 and get 20% off.
  • BILLIE - Go to MyBillie.com/FOREVER35 and get your $9 starter kit today. 
  • SIGNATURE HARDWARE - Real-life isn’t always perfect, but with Signature Hardware it is beautiful. Visit signaturehardware.com/FOREVER35 to find your style today.
  • MASTERCLASS - Visit masterclass.com/forever35 for 15% off the Annual All-Access Pass.
  • MOLEKULE - For 10% off your first order, visit molekule.com and enter FOREVER10 at checkout.
  • BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
